name: What The Blob !?!!
description:
WHAT THE BLOB !?!!: Made in 7 days for Brackeys Gamejam 2021.1

(Theme: Stronger Together)

It would be highly appreciated if you could rate and leave feedback after playing. WebGL / HTML 5  Performance is not that great so if you suffer from any FPS problems please download a executable of your choice from below! Credits:
  • Art & Level Design: Paul Gusee [Itch]
  • Programming: Markus Franz [Itch]
  • Music & SFX: Russell Hodges [Soundcloud]
